name: Portland Japanese Garden
description: Large Japanese garden with beautiful Japanese landscaping, tranquil ponds, and a traditional tea house. Nice, serene escape from the city.

name: International Rose Test Garden
description: Beautiful rose gardens with over 10,000 rose bushes representing more than 650 varieties. Great views of Portland and Mount Hood. Roses are in bloom late May through October.

name: Hat Yai Belmont
description: Casual counter-service restaurant that specializes in Southern Thai food including fried chicken, curry, and roti. Fun cocktails. No reservations.
